speech: In our makeup courses, you’ll cover topics such as skin preparation, contouring, foundation application, eye makeup, bridal and party looks, and special effects.
In our makeup classes, you’ll start with the basics of skin care and progress to advanced techniques like contouring, eye shadow blending, and professional bridal makeup.
The makeup course syllabus includes everything from skin analysis and base application to creative skills like smoky eye looks, contouring, and color correction.
Our curriculum is designed to build essential skills. Topics include facial analysis, product knowledge, blending techniques, and both day and evening makeup.
You’ll gain a well-rounded foundation in makeup artistry, learning about foundation matching, eye makeup styles, and highlighting techniques.
Each course has a unique syllabus based on the level and duration. Would you like details on a specific course?
We also teach trending styles and special effects in the advanced programs. Need more information on a particular topic?
For advanced learners, we also cover bridal and editorial styles. Let us know if you want details on a specific part of the curriculum!"
We offer advanced modules for bridal and party looks, as well as special effects. Is there a specific technique you’d like to learn about?
Advanced modules focus on bridal, party, and theatrical makeup styles. Do you want to explore one of these areas in depth?
